channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Hanukkah On Rye
channel.desc: Sparks fly when a matchmaker pairs Molly and Jacob, until they discover that they are rival deli owners. Will a Hanukkah miracle keep their love afloat.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Christmas Quest
channel.desc: When an archaeologist begins a search for an ancient Christmas treasure, she must team up with her ex-husband - who is an expert in Nordic languages - to find it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas By Candlelight
channel.desc: Wellness expert Juliet enlists candle store owner Tom's help making Christmas memory candles. Will their differing views lead to success or disaster.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Trivia At St Nick's
channel.desc: At a local bar's trivia tournament at the end of the semester, two mismatched students team up to win the coveted prize - and fall in love along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Believe In Christmas
channel.desc: When Beatrice reluctantly joins her best friend on a trip to the enchanting Christmasland, she remains sceptical. But festive traditions and a friendly stranger warms her heart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Christmas Bookshop
channel.desc: The story of a structured Christmas expert and a laid-back bookstore owner who clash, but their rivalry blossoms into a heart-warming romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Holiday Stocking
channel.desc: In Mahogany's first ever Christmas Movie, three estranged sisters are brought back together by a family Christmas tradition - the Holiday Stocking Game.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Three Wiser Men And A Boy
channel.desc: The Brenner brothers are back and putting on a holiday pageant for young Thomas, while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mum's new boyfriend.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Making Spirits Bright
channel.desc: Two feuding families must find a way to get everyone to work together in order to win a town competition that could save their both their livelihoods. Romantic drama.

channel.title: Ghosts Of Christmas Always

channel.title: A Holiday Spectacular
channel.desc: This Christmas, journey back to the 1950s, where heiress Maggie is making her dream of dancing on stage in the Christmas Spectacular come true.

channel.title: The Christmas Contest
channel.desc: Two exes are thrown together when they both enter a Christmas contest to win money for the charity of their choosing. Could they walk away with more than money.

channel.title: The Christmas Brew
channel.desc: While buying a small brewery, Tori falls for the owner - and the town's tight-knit community. When she discovers her boss plans to bankrupt it, she sets out to save the business.
